subject: Home & DIY
title: Natural Light Is the Ultimate Design Tool
description: One-minute skill: Natural Light Is the Ultimate Design Tool.

hook.text: Real estate agents know: the most-asked question isn't about price or size. It's 'how much natural light does it get?'

buildup.text: North-facing rooms get consistent cool light all day. South-facing rooms get warm, shifting light that changes hourly.

discovery.text: East windows give energizing morning sun. West windows deliver harsh afternoon glareâ€”great for sunsets, bad for screens.

twist.text: Mirrors placed opposite windows effectively double a room's perceived natural light by bouncing it deeper inside.

climax.text: Sheer curtains diffuse direct sun into soft glow. The right window treatment matters more than any lamp you'll buy.

punchline.text: The best light in any room is free.

quiz.question: Which window orientation provides consistent cool light throughout the day?
